---
title: "Manage text block library"
date: last-modified

Build a library of reusable text blocks to insert into your documentation templates. Reusable text blocks can be private, visible only to the user, or shared, accessible across your organization.

::: {.callout}
By default, only the [{{< fa hand >}} Customer Admin]{.bubble} role[^1] is able to add, edit, or delete shared text blocks.
:::
